title: Conceptual Simulation-Based Learning Design for Entrepreneurship Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Simulation/VR tool utilization in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment, focusing on science-based applied entrepreneurship case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can conceptually distinguish the three modes of entrepreneurship (about, for, through) and explain their characteristics.
Learners can implement and validate entrepreneurial scenarios utilizing scientific knowledge in a simulation environment.
Learners can apply attitudes and problem-solving strategies required for the entrepreneurial process in VR simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
